messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How many km to Golden Gate Bridge?
I can help with that—what location should I measure from? Please provide your starting point (an address or latitude/longitude coordinates), and I’ll calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge.
I’m not sure of my current location.

I’ll need at least an approximate starting point to compute the distance—such as your city, an address, or coordinates. Can you tell me roughly where you are (e.g. “Los Angeles, CA,” or provide a street address or latitude/longitude)?
I really don’t have any information on where I am now.

To calculate the distance, I need a starting point. If you’re on a device that can share your current location, you could enable location access so I can grab your coordinates automatically. Otherwise, even an approximate city or neighborhood (for example, “Oakland, CA” or “Marin County”) will let me estimate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge. Let me know what you can share!
I wish I could, but I don't have any info on my location.

I’m afraid I can’t compute a distance without at least an approximate starting point—city, town, neighborhood, or GPS coordinates. If you can find out roughly where you are (for example by enabling location services or checking any nearby landmark or city name) and let me know, I’ll be able to calculate the kilometers to the Golden Gate Bridge.
